name: The Adirondack Park
startIntroPart2: There is just one hope for repulsing the tyrannical ambition of civilization to conquer every inch on the whole earth. That hope is the organization of spirited people who will fight for the freedom and preservation of the wilderness. - Bob Marshall
declaringWar: Your land is in need of some preservation.
attacked: We will preserve our park at all costs!
defeated: We regret our losses and hope our lands remain preserved under your jurisdiction.
introduction: Hi there, we welcome you to explore our vast wilderness holdings.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: I'm glad we can get back to more important matters.
tradeRequest: I believe this agreement will be mutually beneficial.
uniques: All units move through Forest Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads.
